!title: Spicy Basil Chicken
!size: 2 portions
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: myrecipes.com (http://www.myrecipes.com/recipe/spicy-basil-chicken-50400000120262/)
!lang: en

* 2 chicken thighs
- debone, cut into cubes
- sauté until done

* 1 bell pepper, sliced
* snow peas
* salt
* dark sesame oil
- sauté
- season

* 1 shallot, chopped
* 1 garlic clove, thinly sliced
- add to chicken, cook for 30 seconds

* 1tbsp fish sauce
* 2tsp palmsuger
* 2tsp soy sauce
* 1 1/4tsp sambal oelek
* 1tsp water
* 1/2tsp cornstarch
* 1/8tsp salt
- add to pan
- cook until mixture thickens

* 1bunch basil, sliced
- stir in
- serve with vegetables and rice
